title: Snapdragon 810 delay claims resurface, despite Qualcomm denial | Trusted Reviews
description: ![]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * The Snapdragon 810 is an octa-core chip, laid out in ARM’s big.LITTLEconfiguration.This means that four of the cores are Cortex-A53, and the other four areCortex-A57.Apparently, it’s the four Cortex-A57 cores that are giving Qualcomm aproduction headache, as they’re overheating when the clock-rate goes north of1.2-1.4GHz.Analysts say TSMC – the firm that actually builds Qualcomm’s chips – will bepushing back the Snapdragon 810 production schedule back by around threemonths.This will give them enough time to redesign some of the chip’s metal layers,although it could mean there won’t be an abundance of chips until halfwaythrough 2015._TrustedReviews_ spoke to Qualcomm yesterday out at CES. Although the chipsetmanufacturer did not discuss potential 810 delays, the company did assure usthe processor would be in ‘multiple’ devices later this quarter and movinginto Q2.**Related:** [CES 2015: What’s happened at the Las Vegas tech expo sofar?](https://www.trustedreviews.com/hubs/ces-2015)Qualcomm announced its upcoming flagship Snapdragon 810 chip last year, withthe new tech boating Adreno 430 graphics, 64-bit architecture support,improved battery life, and 4K video support.We’re expecting the chip to show up many of this year’s top smartphones,including the [LG G4](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/lg-g4-release-date-rumours-news-specs-and-price), the [Sony XperiaZ4](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/sony-xperia-z4-release-date-rumours-news-specs-and-price), and the [Samsung GalaxyS6](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/samsung-galaxy-s6-release-date-rumours-news-specs-and-price).Fortunately for Samsung however, it has its own supercharged Exynos chip inthe works that’s been [rumoured to debut in the GalaxyS6](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/samsung-galaxy-s6-to-land-with-cat-10-lte-reports-suggest).
